languages.text: Нападение возглавляет проклятый предатель, космодесантник Хаоса, за которым следуют разъяренные демоны! Исчадия проникли на борт в районе складочных отсеков — нельзя дать им добраться до палуб с людьми, иначе жертв будет слишком много!

At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!
languages.original_text: Нападение возглавляет проклятый предатель, космодесантник Хаоса, за которым следуют разъяренные демоны! Исчадия проникли на борт в районе складочных отсеков — нельзя дать им добраться до палуб с людьми, иначе жертв будет слишком много!

traits.locale_text: At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship in the storage bay area — they cannot be allowed to reach the populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship in the storage bay area — they cannot be allowed to reach the populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

languages.text: 这次袭击的领头人是个遭到诅咒的叛徒——一名混沌星际战士，身后跟着一群狂暴的恶魔！那群怪物已经通过储藏舱渗透到了舰船之中。如果让他们抵达有人居住的甲板上，必将会造成大量人员死亡，绝不能让这种事情发生！
languages.original_text: At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

traits.locale_text: 这次袭击的领头人是个遭到诅咒的叛徒——一名混沌星际战士，身后跟着一群狂暴的恶魔！那群怪物已经通过储藏舱渗透到了舰船之中。如果让他们抵达有人居住的甲板上，必将会造成大量人员死亡，绝不能让这种事情发生！

languages.text: ¡Liderando el asalto se encuentra un maldito traidor, un Marine Espacial del Caos, seguido de enfurecidos daemons! Los engendros se han colado en la nave por la bodega de carga, ¡no podemos permitir que lleguen a ninguna de las cubiertas habitadas o el número de muertos será desorbitado!
languages.original_text: At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

traits.locale_text: ¡Liderando el asalto se encuentra un maldito traidor, un Marine Espacial del Caos, seguido de enfurecidos daemons! Los engendros se han colado en la nave por la bodega de carga, ¡no podemos permitir que lleguen a ninguna de las cubiertas habitadas o el número de muertos será desorbitado!

languages.text: 迫り来る集団の先頭には、憎むべき裏切り者、渾沌のスペースマリーン、それに怒れるディーモンが続く！集団は倉庫ベイを経由して船に侵入した…奴らが人の多いデッキに立ち入ることは許されない。そんな事態になれば、死者数はとんでもないことになる！
languages.original_text: At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

traits.locale_text: 迫り来る集団の先頭には、憎むべき裏切り者、渾沌のスペースマリーン、それに怒れるディーモンが続く！集団は倉庫ベイを経由して船に侵入した…奴らが人の多いデッキに立ち入ることは許されない。そんな事態になれば、死者数はとんでもないことになる！

languages.text: L'assaut est mené par un traître de la pire espèce, un Space Marine du Chaos suivi par une cohorte de démons enragés ! Ces abominations ont infiltré le vaisseau par la baie de stockage. Il faut à tout prix les empêcher d'atteindre les ponts supérieurs, ou ils massacreront tout l'équipage !
languages.original_text: At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

traits.locale_text: L'assaut est mené par un traître de la pire espèce, un Space Marine du Chaos suivi par une cohorte de démons enragés ! Ces abominations ont infiltré le vaisseau par la baie de stockage. Il faut à tout prix les empêcher d'atteindre les ponts supérieurs, ou ils massacreront tout l'équipage !

languages.text: Der Angriff wird von einem verfluchten Verräter angeführt, einem Chaos Space Marine, dem zornige Dämonen folgen! Die Brut hat das Schiff über die Lagerbucht infiltriert — sie dürfen auf keinen Fall die bewohnten Decks erreichen, sonst gibt es unzählige Todesopfer!
languages.original_text: At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!

traits.locale_text: Der Angriff wird von einem verfluchten Verräter angeführt, einem Chaos Space Marine, dem zornige Dämonen folgen! Die Brut hat das Schiff über die Lagerbucht infiltriert — sie dürfen auf keinen Fall die bewohnten Decks erreichen, sonst gibt es unzählige Todesopfer!

languages.text: Saldırının başında kahrolası bir hain, bir Kaos Uzay Piyadesi. Emrindeki öfkeli iblisler, gemiye depo bölmesinden sızdı. Yaşam alanlarına ulaşmalarına izin verilmemeli, aksi durumda korkunç boyutta can kaybı yaşanabilir!
languages.original_text: At the head of the assault is an accursed traitor, a Chaos Space Marine, followed by enraged daemons! The spawn have infiltrated the ship via the storage bay — they cannot be allowed to reach any populated decks or else the death toll will be exorbitant!
